content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 61, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 21}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "oak_leaves", "quantity": 61, "index": 23}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 26}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "orange_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 28}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 54, "index": 29}, {"type": "milk_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 7, "index": 35}, {"type": "black_carpet", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 53, "index": 42}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "netherite_scrap", "quantity": 9, "index": 44}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 18, "index": 45}]

thought: The goal is to craft light_blue_concrete_powder. This requires crafting light_blue_dye which requires crafting white_dye. The only way to craft white_dye is to use bone_meal, so we'll move it into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

thought: To craft a light_blue_concrete_powder, I first need to craft a light_blue_dye. This can be done by combining a blue_dye and a white_dye in the crafting table. The white_dye is in slot 12, so I will move it into the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
